title: Senate Tracker: A Close Race In Alaska
teaser: Incumbent Senator Mark Begich is facing a challenge from Dan Sullivan, a former state attorney general under then-Gov. Sarah Palin.
contentencoded:
In Alaska, Democratic incumbent U.S. Senator Mark Begich is facing a challenge from Republican Dan Sullivan, a former state attorney general under then-Governor Sarah Palin. Liz Ruskin has been covering the race for Alaska Public Media and joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss.

  • See more in our Senate Tracker series
  • Related: District Profiles series on congressional races

Guest

  • Liz Ruskin, reporter for Alaska Public Media. She tweets @lruskin.
